bibl.title: Who is Who in Antigonus' Letter to the Scepsians (OGIS 5 - Welles, Royal Correspondence 1). Avec résumé en turc.
bibl.note: O.G.I.S. I, 5. "Ptolemaios" (ll. 9-10) simply means Ptolemaeus, i.e. Ptolemy I. Prepelaus (envoy of Cassander and Lysimachus) and Aristodemus (ambassador of Antigonus, i.e. Aristodemus of Miletus) mentioned in l. 11 have nothing to do with Ptolemy.
bibl.seg: Hauben Hans, Who is Who in Antigonus' Letter to the Scepsians (OGIS 5 - Welles, Royal Correspondence 1). Avec résumé en turc.

O.G.I.S. I, 5. "Ptolemaios" (ll. 9-10) simply means Ptolemaeus, i.e. Ptolemy I. Prepelaus (envoy of Cassander and Lysimachus) and Aristodemus (ambassador of Antigonus, i.e. Aristodemus of Miletus) mentioned in l. 11 have nothing to do with Ptolemy.
